name: American Exceptionalism
description: You'll notice that this is an INCREDIBLY thoughtful composition.  So thoughtful in fact, that I POURED over this idea for hours until I ran out of fuel. Even now I'm running on fumes. The joke here is that right now there's a gas shortage not because a major pipeline was hacked and shut down, but because idiots rushed out and started trying to hoard as much gas as possible. It's the Covid toilet paper situation all over again.
